column2: Logic / Description
Direct mapping to the feed — unique key for each property.
Direct mapping to the feed — same as ListingKey.
Direct mapping to the feed — e.g., Residential Freehold, Condo, Commercial.
Direct mapping to the feed — e.g., Detached, Semi-Detached, Townhouse.
Calculated — flatten the array, clean capitalization, and normalize values (e.g., “Att/Row/Townhouse” → “Townhouse”, “2 Storey”, “Condo Apartment”).
Direct mapping to the feed — street number.
Direct mapping to the feed — street name.
Calculated — standardized short form of the street suffix (e.g., Rd, Ave, St).
Direct mapping to the feed — optional unit/suite number.
Direct mapping to the feed — city name (normalize variations like “TORONTO” to “Toronto”).
Direct mapping to the feed — province/state code (e.g., ON).
Direct mapping to the feed — formatted uppercase postal code.
Direct mapping to the feed — region grouping for the city.

Calculated — if the MLS status is “New” or “Price Change,” it is replaced with the TransactionType (“For Sale” or “For Lease”). All other statuses (e.g., Sold, Leased, Suspended, Terminated, Expired) are displayed as-is.
Calculated — based on “OriginalEntryTimestamp” and displayed as “Listed – 20th Jun, 2025.”
Calculated — displayed as “Sold – [Date]” when a SoldDate exists, formatted as “20th Jun, 2025.”
Calculated — displayed as “Suspended – [Date]” when a SuspendedDate exists, formatted as “20th Jun, 2025.”
Calculated — displayed as “Terminated – [Date]” when a TerminatedDate exists, formatted as “20th Jun, 2025.”
Calculated — displayed as “Expired – [Date]” when an ExpiredDate exists, formatted as “20th Jun, 2025.”
Calculated — TRUE if “OriginalEntryTimestamp” is within the last 7 days.
Calculated — when a property is first listed, the ListPrice is duplicated here and remains fixed to preserve the original asking price.
Direct mapping to the feed — current asking price of the property.
Calculated — if ListPrice < OriginalListPrice, this equals OriginalListPrice – ListPrice.
Calculated — if ListPrice < OriginalListPrice, this equals (PriceReductionAmount / OriginalListPrice) × 100, rounded to two decimals.
Calculated — when ListPrice < OriginalListPrice, this field is populated with “Price Reduced” as a frontend flag.
Direct mapping to the feed — number of bedrooms above ground level.
Direct mapping to the feed — number of bedrooms in the basement.
Direct mapping to the feed — total number of bathrooms.
Calculated — parsed minimum from “LivingAreaRange” (e.g., “1500–2000” → 1500).
Calculated — parsed maximum from “LivingAreaRange” (e.g., “1500–2000” → 2000).
Direct mapping to the feed — garage spaces.
Direct mapping to the feed — driveway spaces.
Direct mapping to the feed — total parking spaces.
Calculated — URL of the lowest order image from the listing_media table.
Direct mapping to the feed — unbranded virtual tour link.
Calculated — TRUE if OpenHouseDate ≥ CURRENT_DATE.
Calculated — TRUE if OpenHouseDate = CURRENT_DATE.
Calculated — TRUE if OpenHouseDate = CURRENT_DATE + INTERVAL '1 day'.
Calculated — TRUE if EXTRACT(ISODOW FROM OpenHouseDate) IN (6,7) and OpenHouseDate is within the next 7 days.
Direct mapping to the feed — latest modification timestamp for the record.

Calculated — represents the total number of media items (typically photos) associated with each property. Computed by counting all records in the listing_media table where listing_key matches the property’s ListingKey. Used to display the photo counter (e.g., “+12 Photos”) on the property card.
Logic / Description
Direct mapping — unique identifier for each property.
Direct mapping — same as ListingKey.
Direct mapping — e.g., Residential Freehold, Condo, Commercial.
Calculated — CASE statement normalizes "Att/Row/Townhouse" → "Townhouse", all others pass through unchanged.

Calculated — uses clean_array_to_string() helper function to flatten array, capitalize each element with INITCAP(TRIM()), and exclude 'none', 'unknown', 'n/a', or empty strings. Results in comma-separated string.
Direct mapping — street number.
Calculated — cleaned using INITCAP(TRIM(...)) for consistent capitalization.

Calculated — CASE statement with ILIKE operator standardizes common suffixes: 'avenue' → 'Ave', 'street' → 'St', 'road' → 'Rd', 'drive' → 'Dr', 'crescent' → 'Cres', 'boulevard' → 'Blvd'. All others trimmed and returned as-is (NULLIF removes empty strings).
Direct mapping — full-length suffix before abbreviation.
Direct mapping — unit or suite number, if present.
Calculated — CASE statement converts any variant of "TORONTO*" to "Toronto", all others use INITCAP(TRIM(...)).
Direct mapping — community or neighbourhood name.
Calculated — cleaned using INITCAP(TRIM(...)) for consistent capitalization.
Direct mapping — two-letter province/state code (e.g., ON).
Calculated — uppercased and trimmed using UPPER(TRIM(...)).
Direct mapping — raw address string before normalization.
Direct mapping — name of lake, river, or water body if applicable.
Direct mapping — boolean or text flag indicating waterfront presence.
Direct mapping — indicates visible water view.
Calculated — uses clean_array_to_string() helper function to flatten array, capitalize with INITCAP(TRIM()), and exclude 'none', 'unknown', 'n/a', or empty strings. Results in comma-separated string.
Calculated — CASE statement: if status is "New" or "Price Change", replace with COALESCE(TransactionType, 'For Sale'); all others remain unchanged.
Calculated — CASE statement: when date exists, displays as "Sold - " || TO_CHAR(date, 'FMDDth Mon, YYYY'). Otherwise NULL.
Calculated — CASE statement: when date exists, displays as "Suspended - " || TO_CHAR(date, 'FMDDth Mon, YYYY'). Otherwise NULL.
Calculated — CASE statement: when date exists, displays as "Terminated - " || TO_CHAR(date, 'FMDDth Mon, YYYY'). Otherwise NULL.
Calculated — CASE statement: when date exists, displays as "Expired - " || TO_CHAR(date, 'FMDDth Mon, YYYY'). Otherwise NULL.
Calculated — Boolean: (OriginalEntryTimestamp IS NOT NULL AND CURRENT_DATE - (OriginalEntryTimestamp AT TIME ZONE 'UTC')::date <= 7).
Calculated — CASE statement: when OriginalEntryTimestamp exists, returns CURRENT_DATE - (OriginalEntryTimestamp AT TIME ZONE 'UTC')::date. Otherwise NULL.
Direct mapping — latest record update timestamp.
Direct mapping — current asking price.
Direct mapping — final sale or lease price.
Calculated — COALESCE(p."OriginalListPrice", p."ListPrice") — uses OriginalListPrice if available, otherwise falls back to ListPrice.
Calculated — CASE statement: when OriginalListPrice > ListPrice, returns OriginalListPrice - ListPrice. Otherwise NULL.
Calculated — CASE statement: when OriginalListPrice > 0 AND ListPrice < OriginalListPrice, returns ROUND((OriginalListPrice - ListPrice) / OriginalListPrice * 100, 2). Otherwise NULL.
Calculated — CASE statement: when ListPrice < OriginalListPrice, returns text 'Price Reduced'. Otherwise NULL.
Direct mapping — number of bedrooms above ground level.
Direct mapping — number of basement bedrooms.
Direct mapping — total number of bathrooms.
Direct mapping — number of kitchens above grade.
Direct mapping — number of kitchens below grade.
Calculated — CASE statement: when LivingAreaRange exists, extracts minimum value using NULLIF(REGEXP_REPLACE(SPLIT_PART(LivingAreaRange, '-', 1), '[^0-9]', '', 'g'), '')::NUMERIC. Otherwise NULL.

Calculated — CASE statement: when LivingAreaRange exists AND contains '-', extracts maximum value using NULLIF(REGEXP_REPLACE(SPLIT_PART(LivingAreaRange, '-', 2), '[^0-9]', '', 'g'), '')::NUMERIC. Otherwise NULL.
Direct mapping — numeric width of the lot.
Direct mapping — numeric depth of the lot.
Direct mapping — measurement unit (Feet, Metres, Acres).

Calculated — Complex CASE statement: when LotWidth AND LotDepth exist and are > 0, converts to acres based on LotSizeUnits: FEET → (Width × Depth) / 43560, METRES → (Width × Depth) / 4046.86, ACRES → Width × Depth unchanged. Result rounded to 4 decimals. Otherwise NULL.
Direct mapping — numeric or textual age of the structure.

Calculated — Subquery with string_agg(DISTINCT status_value, ', ' ORDER BY status_value). Derives from Basement array: normalizes 'Finished with Walk-Out' → 'Finished'. Includes: Apartment, Finished, Partially Finished, Unfinished, Crawl Space, Development Potential, Exposed Rock, Half, None, Other, Partial Basement, Unknown. Excludes: Separate Entrance, Walk-Out, Walk-Up, Full. Each value INITCAP(TRIM()). Returns NULL if array empty.

Calculated — Subquery with string_agg(DISTINCT entrance_value, ', ' ORDER BY entrance_value). Derives from Basement array: converts 'Finished with Walk-Out' → 'Walk-Out'. Includes only: Separate Entrance, Walk-Out, Walk-Up. Each value INITCAP(TRIM()). Returns NULL if array empty or no valid entrance types found.
Calculated — Boolean: (COALESCE(p."KitchensBelowGrade", 0) >= 1). Returns TRUE if at least one kitchen below grade exists, FALSE otherwise.
Calculated — Boolean with EXISTS subquery: returns TRUE if Basement array contains any of: 'apartment', 'separate entrance', or 'walk-out' (case-insensitive after LOWER(TRIM())). FALSE otherwise.
Direct mapping — garage spaces.
Direct mapping — driveway spaces.
Direct mapping — total parking spaces.
Direct mapping — yearly property tax.
Direct mapping — fiscal year of tax data.
Direct mapping — recurring condo or association fee.
Direct mapping — extra monthly maintenance or assessment fee.
Calculated — uses clean_array_to_string() helper function to flatten array, capitalize with INITCAP(TRIM()), and exclude 'none', 'unknown', 'n/a', or empty strings. Results in comma-separated string.
Calculated — uses clean_array_to_string() helper function to flatten array, capitalize with INITCAP(TRIM()), and exclude 'none', 'unknown', 'n/a', or empty strings. Results in comma-separated string.
Calculated — uses clean_array_to_string() helper function to flatten array, capitalize with INITCAP(TRIM()), and exclude 'none', 'unknown', 'n/a', or empty strings. Results in comma-separated string.
Calculated — uses clean_array_to_string() helper function to flatten array, capitalize with INITCAP(TRIM()), and exclude 'none', 'unknown', 'n/a', or empty strings. Results in comma-separated string.
Calculated — uses clean_array_to_string() helper function to flatten array, capitalize with INITCAP(TRIM()), and exclude 'none', 'unknown', 'n/a', or empty strings. Results in comma-separated string.
Calculated — uses clean_array_to_string() helper function to flatten array, capitalize with INITCAP(TRIM()), and exclude 'none', 'unknown', 'n/a', or empty strings. Results in comma-separated string.
Direct mapping — primary heating type (e.g., Forced Air, Radiant).
Direct mapping — boolean flag indicating presence of fireplace.
Calculated — uses clean_array_to_string() helper function to flatten array, capitalize with INITCAP(TRIM()), and exclude 'none', 'unknown', 'n/a', or empty strings. Results in comma-separated string.
Direct mapping — furnished/unfurnished indicator.

Calculated — Complex CASE statement with regex pattern matching on PossessionDetails: '^(imm|immediate|asap|vacant|available|now|ready)' → 'Immediate'; 'flex' → 'Flexible'; '^(tba|tbd|tbc|tab|negotiable|neg|to be)' → 'TBA'; 'anytime' → 'Anytime'; '^\d+[-/]\d+' → extracts day range + ' Days'; '^\d+\s*(day|d\s)' → extracts single day count + ' Days'; 'tenant' → 'Tenanted'; '(to be built|construction|build)' → 'To Be Built'; date patterns (months/years) → cleaned and capitalized. Default: INITCAP with whitespace normalized.
Calculated — uses clean_array_to_string() helper function to flatten array, capitalize with INITCAP(TRIM()), and exclude 'none', 'unknown', 'n/a', or empty strings. Results in comma-separated string.
Calculated — uses clean_array_to_string() helper function to flatten array, capitalize with INITCAP(TRIM()), and exclude 'none', 'unknown', 'n/a', or empty strings. Results in comma-separated string.
Calculated — uses clean_array_to_string() helper function to flatten array, capitalize with INITCAP(TRIM()), and exclude 'none', 'unknown', 'n/a', or empty strings. Results in comma-separated string.
Calculated — From next_open_house CTE: BOOL_OR(OpenHouseDate >= CURRENT_DATE) OVER (PARTITION BY ListingKey). TRUE if any upcoming open house exists.
Calculated — From next_open_house CTE: BOOL_OR(OpenHouseDate = CURRENT_DATE) OVER (PARTITION BY ListingKey). TRUE if open house scheduled today.
Calculated — From next_open_house CTE: BOOL_OR(OpenHouseDate = CURRENT_DATE + INTERVAL '1 day') OVER (PARTITION BY ListingKey). TRUE if open house scheduled tomorrow.

Calculated — From next_open_house CTE: BOOL_OR(EXTRACT(ISODOW FROM OpenHouseDate) IN (6,7) AND OpenHouseDate BETWEEN CURRENT_DATE AND CURRENT_DATE + INTERVAL '7 days') OVER (PARTITION BY ListingKey). TRUE if weekend open house within next 7 days.
Direct mapping — geocoded latitude coordinate.
Direct mapping — geocoded longitude coordinate.
Direct mapping — timestamp when address was last geocoded.
Direct mapping — result of geocoding (Success, Partial, Failed).
Direct mapping — condo balcony style or size descriptor.
Direct mapping — locker availability for condo listings.
Direct mapping — unbranded virtual tour link.
Direct mapping — full property description or agent remarks.
